description.narrative: Indonesia business case has concluded that an independent affiliate in Indonesia presented a feasible opportunity for Oxfam. Based on the study, legal analysis and further consultation process in 2019 and 2020, the model that will deliver the missionideally aim at establishment of affiliate from a locally rooted CSO in Indonesia that is fit strategically with Oxfam’s vision and hence mutual interest will drive the local CSO to continue and join Oxfam Confederation as an affiliate representing theglobal south voice and presence. As an affiliate, Oxfam Indonesia will be able to layout the model and deliver the work differently that will be aligned with the confederation model. Oxfam in Indonesia could establish and experiment intentionallypartnership and humanitarian model that will be practiced differently as we recognise that partnership model is the ultimate enabling factor and transform our approach in humanitarian model will be the key model operational load benefit that Oxfam Indonesia couldpresent as an affiliate. GOAL: Oxfam in Indonesia is transitioning into an affiliate organization that is leading Inequality and Local Humanitarian Leadership in Indonesia and the region.

participating-org.narrative:
Novib in 1994 became a member of Oxfam International. A group of twelve independent, like-minded development organizations strivingfor a fairer world.
Oxfam's work with a total of 3,000 partner organizations in 100 countries. They maintain contacts with severalmajor international networks and civil society organizations. The collaboration began with advocacy but also extends to the projectwork and joint campaigning and relief.
One of the members of Oxfam International, Oxfam GB, an independent British organization. Oxfam GB works with volunteers, donors. Oxfam GB has an office in Jakarta.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to life and security
